LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow) 53.6 mg/L/96 hr (confidence limit 49.3-58.3 mg/L), flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 25.1 °C, dissolved oxygen 6.8 mg/L, hardness 46.5 mg/L calcium carbonate, alkalinity 43.5 mg/L calcium carbonate, and pH 7.7

EC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow) 53.6 mg/L/96 hr (confidence limit 49.3-58.3 mg/L), flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 25.1 °C, dissolved oxygen 6.8 mg/L, hardness 46.5 mg/L calcium carbonate, alkalinity 43.5 mg/L calcium carbonate, and pH 7.7. Effect: loss of equilibrium was not observed prior to death.
